p: State-wise details of livestock by breed, age, sex and management type were obtained from the 19th Livestock Census of the Government of India ( GOI, 2012). The information on livestock body weight, feed consumption and per-capita production of meat and milk ( Table 2) were based on Singhal and Mohini (2002) and on expert judgement from the National Dairy Research Institute (NDRI) following relationships outlined in Herrero et al. (2013).
